name: Zombie

[Em]Another[C]head hangs[G]lowly child is[D/F#]slowly taken 
[Em]And the[C]violence caused such[G]silence who are[D/F#]we mistaken 
But you[Em]see it's not me, it's[C]not my family, 
In your[G]head, in your head, they are[D/F#]fighting

It's the[Em]same old theme[C]since 1916, 
in your[G]head, in your head, they're still[D/F#]fighting
